official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the tax treatment of certain expenses incurred in closing a landfill site.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that qualified landfill closure expenditures shall be treated as a currently deductible business expense rather than as a capital expenditure.
